name: Space-Time Assassin VR
description:
Game created for the VR-Jam2020, theme: one tool multiple uses.

This is a VR project worked on in Unreal Engine 4 over 7 days by two designers.
It contains full locomotion, teleportation, sword based combat with enemy AI and time control.

How to Play: ActionHTC ViveOculusWalk
Turn
Teleport [hold to aim]JumpSlow Time [Hold]
[Press down] Credits:
  • Giandomenico "James" Lombardi - physics, combat, ai
  • Gabriel Madog Joyce - player mechanics, level design, set dressing, sound
Third Party Assets:
  • Mixamo.com
  • Advanced Magix FX13
  • Elite AlienPack 04
  • Human Vocalisations
  • Industry Props Pack 6
  • Seaside Town
  • Soul City
  • Tropical Ocean Tool
  • Weapon Pack
